### READ THIS FIRST (do not include in the report!)
Please try turning off all your plugins first to solve the bug. Only submit the bug report if this does not solve the issue. 

### Information (remove the brackets):

 - OS & platform/s: [ e.g. Fedora Linux/macOS 26/Android 16/etc. ]
 - Obsidian app & Installer version: [ e.g. Obsidian 1.15 (installer version 1.14) ]
- Velocity version: [ e.g. Velocity 2.0.0 ]

### Short Description
A clear description of what the bug is.

### To Reproduce (i.e., when does the bug occur?)
If you know how the bug was triggered, please let me know how so I can attempt to replicate it on my end. 

### Screenshot(s) of bug
Attach screenshots here.

### Default Theme for comparison
Before submitting any bug report, please check if the issue occurs with the Default Theme as well.
